✅## Opening and closing sidebar  Ctrl + B 

✅## Select word   Ctrl + D

✅## Code folding   Ctrl + Shift + [

✅## Code unfolding  Ctrl + Shift + ]

✅## Copy line up/down  Shift + Alt + Up/Down

✅## Quick file open   Ctrl + P 

✅## Toggle terminal   Ctrl+backtick (Ctrl+`)

✅## Switch Tabs  Ctrl+1, Ctrl+2, Ctrl+3

✅## Delete line   Ctrl + Shift + K

✅## Move line   Alt + Up/Down arrow

✅##

✅##
